message.name: ERR_PROVIDERAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_ACTIVE_APPROVALCHECK_EXISTS_FOR_PROVIDER
message.locale: An '%1c' approval check already exists for this provider.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_OFFERING_APPROVALCHECK_XRV_ACTIVE_APPROVALCHECK_EXISTS_FOR_PROVIDER_OFFERING
message.locale: An '%1c' approval check already exists for this provider offering.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_OFFERING_APPROVALCHECK_XRV_PROVIDER_OFFERING_IS_NOT_ACTIVE
message.locale: The provider offering, %1s, is not 'Active', the approval check cannot be specified for it.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_OFFERING_APPROVALCHECK_XRV_PROVIDER_OFFERING_ENDS_IN_PAST
message.locale: The provider offering, %1s, has ended in the past, the approval check cannot be specified for it.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_APPROVALCHECK_XFV_INDIVIDUAL_PROVIDER_SELECTED_APPLIES_TO_ALL_CANNOT_BE_TRUE
message.locale: 'Applies to All Providers' cannot be selected if an individual provider is specified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_APPROVALCHECK_XFV_EITHER_INDIVIDUAL_PROVIDER_OR_APPLIES_TO_ALL_PROVIDER_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: One of either 'Applies to All Providers' or an individual provider must be selected.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_APPROVALCHECK_XRV_ORGANISATION_UNIT_NOT_ACTIVE_APPROVALCHECK_CANNOT_BE_CREATED
message.locale: The organization unit, %1s, is not '%2c', approval check cannot be specified.
The organisation unit, %1s, is not '%2c', approval check cannot be specified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_APPROVALCHECK_XRV_ACTIVE_APPROVALCHECK_EXISTS_FOR_PROVIDER_AND_ORGANISATION_UNIT
message.locale: An '%1c' approval check already exists for the provider, %2s, for the organization unit, %3s, approval check cannot be specified.
An '%1c' approval check already exists for the provider, %2s, for the organisation unit, %3s, approval check cannot be specified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_APPROVALCHECK_XRV_USER_NOT_ACTIVE_APPROVALCHECK_CANNOT_BE_CREATED
message.locale: The user, %1s, is not '%2c', approval check cannot be specified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_APPROVALCHECK_XRV_ACTIVE_APPROVALCHECK_EXISTS_FOR_PROVIDER_AND_USER
message.locale: An '%1c' approval check already exists for the provider, %2s, for the user, %3s, approval check cannot be specified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_ACTIVE_APPROVALCHECK_EXISTS_FOR_PROVIDER_OFFERING_AND_ORGANIZATION_UNIT
message.locale: An 'Active' approval check already exists for the provider service, %1s, for the organization unit, %2s, approval check cannot be specified.
An 'Active' approval check already exists for the service, %1s, for the organisation unit, %2s, approval check cannot be specified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_ACTIVE_APPROVALCHECK_EXISTS_FOR_PROVIDER_OFFERING_AND_USER
message.locale: An 'Active' approval check already exists for the provider service, %1s, for the user, %2s, approval check cannot be specified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_APPROVAL_CHECK_CAN_BE_SPECIFIED_FOR_ACTIVE_ORGANIZATION_UNIT
message.locale: The organization unit, %1s, is not 'Active', approval check cannot be specified.
The organisation unit, %1s, is not 'Active', approval check cannot be specified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_APPROVAL_CHECK_CAN_BE_SPECIFIED_FOR_ACTIVE_USER
message.locale: The user, %1s, is not 'Active', approval check cannot be specified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_APPROVALCHECK_XRV_ACTIVE_APPROVALCHECK_EXISTS_FOR_ALL_PROVIDERS_AND_ORGANISATION_UNIT
message.locale: An '%1c' approval check already exists for all providers, for the organization unit, %2s, approval check cannot be specified.
An '%1c' approval check already exists for all providers, for the organisation unit, %2s, approval check cannot be specified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_APPROVALCHECK_XRV_ACTIVE_APPROVALCHECK_EXISTS_FOR_ALL_PROVIDERS_AND_USER
message.locale: An '%1c' approval check already exists for all providers, for the user, %2s, approval check cannot be specified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_ACTIVE_APPROVALCHECK_EXISTS_FOR_ALL_PROVIDER_OFFERINGS_AND_ORGANIZATION_UNIT
message.locale: An 'Active' approval check already exists for all services offered by the provider, %1s, for the organization unit, %2s, approval check cannot be specified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_ACTIVE_APPROVALCHECK_EXISTS_FOR_ALL_PROVIDER_OFFERINGS_AND_USER
message.locale: An 'Active' approval check already exists for all services offered by the provider, %1s, for the user, %2s, approval check cannot be specified.
